summary: Joe Cross examines how to make healthy habits last. Joe meets with experts who present realistic solutions to make long-term sustainable improvements to eating behaviors and overall health.
cast: Joe Cross|Bjarke de Koning|Carrie Diulus|Sheila Kar|Russell Kennedy|John Mackey|Dean Ornish|Terry Pennington|Ben Shuldiner|Mark Spradlin|Phil Staples|Jennifer Taylor|Brian Wansink
title: Fat, Sick & Nearly Dead 2
